@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  please inform TG to start the service on 15th Jan 25 in kiosk/ last day for services in boutique on 1st Jan 25 after collecting the EOD cash.

 

@Naeem Baniameen <mailto:Naeem.Baniameen@puigme.com>  @Babu Kodithodika <mailto:Kodithodika.Babu@puigme.com>  Ensure store code and BU code is activated/ ranging and pricing request is raised to MDM team and transfer shipment is created.

@Abdalla Ahmed <mailto:Abdalla.Ahmed@chalhoub.com> @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> @Real UAE - Logistics - Distribution <mailto:RealUAE-Logistics-Distribution@mailmac.net> @Sredha Mathai <mailto:Sredha.Mathai@chalhoub.com>  please share documents to apply for permit.

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach me 050-3859997.

Regards,

 

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

‑

tail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com> >; Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com <mailto:Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RSO UAE - STORE Opening - Penhaligons Kiosk- Dubai Mall
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have an Opening of Store “Penhaligons Kiosk at Dubai Mall” the opening date is on Wed 15th Jan 25.

 

To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task.

 

Best Regards,

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

‑
